pRon Paulounced after a few audience members- reportedly Ron Paul supporters- heckled speeches by Donald Rumsfeld and former vice president Dick Cheney last Friday. The hecklers yelled,`` War criminal!''`` Where's bin Laden?'' and Dick Cheney , where are the shekels? before being removed from the audience. And the widespread annoyance with Ron Paul 's fans seemed to translate into increased animosity toward the congressman himself. His statements on foreign policy were loudly booed by many in the

Tem Dwaine Caraway gave a`` key to the city'' to Michael Vick . The action spawned outrage from many North Texans( including our Mayor Tom Tom Leppert releasing the following statement on Monday afternoon: The action taken was not sanctioned by my office and was not an official ceremonial honor on behalf of the City of Dallas. Official Keys to the City are presented by the Mayor Tom , or an elected official designated by the Mayor Tom , and reserved, on a limited basis, for an elected official of international status. Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and done without my knowledge or approval. Given these circumstances I have requested the City Manager propose guidelines to prevent this situation in the future. he could think most people in Dallas would support the decision to give Michael Vick a key when many see him as the face of cruelty to animals, Dwaine Caraway responded that not everyone sees him that way.
